pagaone.title: paga.one
pagaone.tagline: Your link to share bank accounts.
pagaone.subtitle: No more asking for CLABEs. Split bills instantly.
pagaone.problemP1: In Mexico, splitting restaurant bills is painful. Everyone asks "Â¿CuÃ¡l es tu CLABE?" and you have to read out 18 digits. Multiple times. For multiple accounts.
pagaone.problemP2: Freelancers and small business owners juggle multiple bank accounts but have no simple way to share them. Copy-pasting CLABEs into WhatsApp messages gets old fast.
pagaone.problemP3: The friction is real. The solution should be simple.
pagaone.solutionP1: One link: paga.one/username. All your bank accounts in one place. Share it once, use it forever.
pagaone.solutionP2: For group payments: upload the restaurant receipt, set amounts, share the link. Everyone sees the total, pays their part, and you track who's paid.
pagaone.solutionP3: Simple. Fast. No apps to download. Just works.
pagaone.feature1Desc: Your personalized URL (paga.one/username) with all your bank accounts in one place.
pagaone.feature2Desc: Upload restaurant receipt, divide amounts, and share payment link with your group.
pagaone.feature3Desc: Auto-generated OG images with your account data. Share on social media with rich previews.
pagaone.feature4Desc: See who paid and who still owes. Real-time progress tracking.
pagaone.whyStackDesc: Next.js 15 for speed. React 19 for modern UX. Supabase for real-time data and auth. Everything deployed on Vercel's edge network. The result? Fast, reliable, and scalable from day one.
pagaone.ctaDesc: From concept to production-ready product. Let's ship something people actually want to use.

puntogo.description: Smart rewards system that turns every visit into a game experience, multiplying your loyalty value up to 10X.
puntogo.problemP1: Traditional loyalty programs are boring and forgettable.
puntogo.problemP2: Customers collect points slowly, rewards feel distant, and daily engagement is zero.
puntogo.problemP3: Result? Low retention and missed revenue opportunities.
puntogo.solutionP1: PuntoGo gamifies loyalty with daily engagement mechanics.
puntogo.solutionP2: Spin the wheel every 24h for 2X-10X multipliers. Turn a $100 meal into 1,000 points.
puntogo.solutionP3: Result? Customers come back daily, spend more, and love the experience.
puntogo.feature1Desc: 1 punto = $1 MXN. Direct redemption at checkout. Simple, transparent, valuable.
puntogo.feature2Desc: Spin the wheel every 24h. Win 2X, 3X, 5X, or legendary 10X multipliers.
puntogo.feature3Desc: Activate your multiplier and watch your points explode. Limited time = urgency.
puntogo.feature4Desc: Real-time menu with Polo Tab API. Browse, order, and earn points seamlessly.
puntogo.feature5Desc: Upload receipt photo. Google Vision OCR extracts totals. Auto-awards points.
puntogo.feature6Desc: 6 modules: QR scanner, menu management, points control, analytics, and more.
puntogo.step1Desc: Browse menu, order food, pay at checkout. Every peso = 1 point automatically.
puntogo.step2Desc: Open app, spin Daily Drop wheel. Win multipliers: 2X (common), 5X (rare), 10X (legendary).
puntogo.step3Desc: Multiplier active for 24h. Next purchase: $500 Ã— 5X = 2,500 points. Magic.
puntogo.step4Desc: Points = money. Redeem at checkout. 1,000 points = $1,000 MXN off. Simple.
puntogo.resultsDesc: From concept to beta with real users. Complete gamification system, admin dashboard, and production-ready infrastructure.
puntogo.ctaTitle: Want a loyalty system like this?
puntogo.ctaDesc: Custom gamification, mobile apps, and admin tools in weeks.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: One membership. Unlimited requests* (November only). Build until you launch.
pricing.promoNote: *November Launch Promo - Afterwards switches to token-based system
pricing.feature1Desc: Add as many features to your queue as you need
pricing.priorityDesc: Once your project is defined, adjustment requests are handled through a ticket system with these response times:

wizard.step1Title: What problem do you want to solve?
wizard.step1Subtitle: This helps us understand your vision
wizard.step2Subtitle: Think about the "why" it should exist
wizard.step2Placeholder: E.g., "People deserve to sell their vehicles without sacrificing mobility or accepting unfair offers..."
wizard.step2Tip: Tip: The best products solve real frustrations. Does your idea solve something YOU have experienced?
wizard.step3Subtitle: Define your ideal user in one sentence
wizard.step3Example1: Car sellers who need quick liquidity
wizard.step3Insight: 80% of successful MVPs start with a specific niche, not "for everyone"
wizard.step5Title: When do you need to launch?
wizard.step5Subtitle: This affects our approach and timeline
wizard.step5UrgentInsight: Perfect for MVP. We prioritize core features and fast launch.
wizard.step5SoonInsight: Balanced approach with room for refinement.
wizard.step5PlannedInsight: Time for comprehensive features and polish.
wizard.step5FlexibleInsight: We can iterate calmly and add extra polish.
wizard.step6Title: Do you have a budget in mind?
wizard.step6Subtitle: Being honest helps us propose the best approach
wizard.step6Note: No matter your budget, we'll give you realistic options. No surprises.
wizard.step7Title: How would you like to pay?
wizard.step7Subtitle: Both options work with subscription model
wizard.step7CommittedDesc: Divided into partial payments during development
wizard.step7CommittedInsight: Pay in installments throughout the development period. Fixed commitment based on the estimate, divided into monthly payments until completion. After delivery, maintenance and monitoring become your responsibility.
wizard.step7SubscriptionDesc: Pay monthly with 24/7 support & monitoring included
wizard.step7SubscriptionInsight: Includes 24/7 system monitoring and maintenance. Currently unlimited requests during November. Will transition to a token-based system where each request consumes credits based on complexity. Pause or cancel anytime.

estimate.title: Your Project Estimate
estimate.subtitle: Here's what we can build together
estimate.subscriptionDesc3: of subscription at $10,000 MXN/month with monthly credits to implement your features.
estimate.subscriptionSubtitle: That you can cancel at any time
estimate.howItWorksDesc: Each month you receive credits to request features, fixes, and improvements. Your project cost determines the minimum subscription months needed.
estimate.exampleDesc: A $30,000 MXN project = minimum 3 months subscription. Your credits cover all initial development + ongoing improvements.
estimate.disclaimer: * Estimates are based on the information provided. Final pricing may vary based on project complexity and specific requirements. Let's discuss your project in detail.
